import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (l, r, z) = [int(l) for l in input().split()]
    a1 = z - (r - l)
    a2 = z + (r - l)
    a = 0
    l1 = 2 * (r - l)
    p = 0
    q1 = []
    for i in range(100):
        q1.append(1)
    tec = 0
    mac = 0
    for j in range(l, r + 1, 1):
        m = a2 % j
        if m == 0:
            a = j
            p = a2
            break
        elif m <= l1:
            a = j
            p = a2 - m
            break
    q = z - p
    if q >= 0:
        b = r
        c = r - q
    if q < 0:
        b = l
        c = l - q
    print(a, b, c)

import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (l, r, z) = [int(l) for l in input().split()]
    a1 = z - (r - l)
    a2 = z + (r - l)
    a = 0
    l1 = 2 * (r - l)
    p = 0
    q1 = [1] * 100
    (tec, mac) = (0, 0)
    for j in range(l, r + 1, 1):
        m = a2 % j
        if m == 0:
            (a, p) = (j, a2)
            break
        elif m <= l1:
            (a, p) = (j, a2 - m)
            break
    q = z - p
    if q >= 0:
        (b, c) = (r, r - q)
    if q < 0:
        (b, c) = (l, l - q)
    print(a, b, c)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (l, r, z) = map(int, input().split())
    a1 = z - (r - l)
    a2 = z + (r - l)
    a = 0
    l1 = 2 * (r - l)
    p = 0
    q1 = [1] * 100
    (tec, mac) = (0, 0)
    for j in range(l, r + 1, 1):
        m = a2 % j
        if m == 0:
            (a, p) = (j, a2)
            break
        elif m <= l1:
            (a, p) = (j, a2 - m)
            break
    q = z - p
    if q >= 0:
        (b, c) = (r, r - q)
    if q < 0:
        (b, c) = (l, l - q)
    print(a, b, c)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (l, r, z) = map(int, input().split())
    a1 = z - (r - l)
    a2 = z + (r - l)
    (a, p) = (0, 0)
    l1 = 2 * (r - l)
    q1 = [1] * 100
    (tec, mac) = (0, 0)
    for j in range(l, r + 1, 1):
        m = a2 % j
        if m == 0:
            (a, p) = (j, a2)
            break
        elif m <= l1:
            (a, p) = (j, a2 - m)
            break
    q = z - p
    if q >= 0:
        (b, c) = (r, r - q)
    if q < 0:
        (b, c) = (l, l - q)
    print(a, b, c)
